title: Luxurious Quadruplex with Private Garden in Faqra
location: Faqra, Mount Lebanon Governorate, Kesrouane district
description: Discover an unparalleled living experience in Faqra near the Emile Lahoud roundabout with this exquisite quadruplex chalet. Nestled within a charming building comprising 7 chalets. Spanning across 210 square meters, this quadruplex is meticulously designed and beautifully furnished, boasting a fully equipped interior. The property is thoughtfully arranged over four floors, offering ample space and privacy for modern living. he ground floor features convenient amenities including storage, a heating room, maid's quarters, and a parking entrance. Ascend to the first floor to be greeted by a welcoming reception area with a chimney, a guest WC, and a well-appointed kitchenette.  The second floor presents a seamless flow between the kitchen, living area with a chimney, dining space, and a guest WC, complemented by a serene balcony offering panoramic views.  On the third floor, two cozy bedrooms with balconies await, providing tranquil retreats for relaxation. The fourth floor hosts a lavish master bedroom, exuding sophistication and comfort.  Enhanced by two secure parking spots, a private elevator, and generous visitor parking outside, convenience is paramount in this exclusive residence. Residents benefit from continuous power supply courtesy of two generators, ensuring uninterrupted comfort.  Moreover, the property boasts a private garden spanning 110 square meters across two levels, ideal for outdoor gatherings and leisure activities. Enjoy the convenience of a well for water supply, eliminating water-related expenses.  With an exceptionally low annual maintenance cost, residents enjoy peace of mind knowing that concierge services, generator fuel, and maintenance are efficiently managed and shared among the owners of 15 chalets within the adjacent buildings.  Experience the epitome of luxury living in Faqra with this remarkable quadruplex, where every detail is meticulously crafted for the discerning homeowner's delight.
